ygData.subject: Re: bards agi & dodge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Unfortunately, our programmer is no longer on the list, however, it is my firm belief that Agility has nothing to do with the Dodge skill - it is based
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:43 PM 8/27/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: "Donar von Thruthheim" <donar@...>
>
>Has there been anything difinative(said by the bard programmer) about a
>bards agility stat being used to check if the bard has succesfully used his
>dodge skill?
>
>In other words is it worth while for bards to raise their agility so they
>dodge more often?

Unfortunately, our programmer is no longer on the list, however, it is my
firm belief that Agility has nothing to do with the Dodge skill - it is
based completely on the skill alone.

Talies the Wanderer
